keywords: Cake,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Strawberry Vanilla Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180C. Lightly grease and line a 20cm cake tin and set aside.
Beat together the butter and sugar until it is light and fluffy.
Add the eggs and vanilla essence and beat until mixture is smooth.
Fold in the flour and milk, mixing well.
Add the strawberries to the mixture and fold together. Spoon mixture into the cake tin and bake for about 40-45 minutes. Once cake is cooked let it stand on a wire rack to completely cool down.
Strawberry Icing: Combine icing sugar and strawberries, mix until well combined. Spread onto the cooled cake and serve.
